languages.text: "Епископ Иеронимус, прозванный Скорбным. Глава {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианской{/g} миссии и, вероятно, последняя надежда для заблудших душ, населяющих этот забытый нашим владыкой край".

traits.locale_text: "Епископ Иеронимус, прозванный Скорбным. Глава друзианской миссии и, вероятно, последняя надежда для заблудших душ, населяющих этот забытый нашим владыкой край".
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."
languages.original_text: "Епископ Иеронимус, прозванный Скорбным. Глава {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}друзианской{/g} миссии и, вероятно, последняя надежда для заблудших душ, населяющих этот забытый нашим владыкой край".

traits.locale_text: "I am Bishop Hieronimus — Hieronimus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the Drusian mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

traits.locale_text: "I am Bishop Hieronimus — Hieronimus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the Drusian mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."

traits.locale_text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the Drusian mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."

traits.locale_text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the Drusian mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."

traits.locale_text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: “我是希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索，人们称我为希罗尼穆斯牧师。我是{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}德鲁苏斯{/g}布道所的负责人。在这片被我们的主人所遗弃的边缘地带，我或许是那些迷失的灵魂的最后希望。”
languages.original_text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."

traits.locale_text: “我是希罗尼穆斯·多罗洛索，人们称我为希罗尼穆斯牧师。我是{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}德鲁苏斯{/g}布道所的负责人。在这片被我们的主人所遗弃的边缘地带，我或许是那些迷失的灵魂的最后希望。”
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: «Soy el reverendo Hieronymus, también conocido como Hieronymus Doloroso. Dirijo la misión {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusiana{/g} y probablemente sea la última esperanza de las almas errantes que habitan esta franja abandonada por nuestro Señor».
languages.original_text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."

traits.locale_text: «Soy el reverendo Hieronymus, también conocido como Hieronymus Doloroso. Dirijo la misión {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusiana{/g} y probablemente sea la última esperanza de las almas errantes que habitan esta franja abandonada por nuestro Señor».
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: 「私はヒエロニムス司祭――ヒエロニムス・ドロローソと呼ばれている。{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルスス派{/g}伝道団体の長で、領主に見捨てられたこの辺境に住む、道を踏み外した魂の最後の希望と呼べる存在かもしれません」
languages.original_text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."

traits.locale_text: 「私はヒエロニムス司祭――ヒエロニムス・ドロローソと呼ばれている。{g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}ドルスス派{/g}伝道団体の長で、領主に見捨てられたこの辺境に住む、道を踏み外した魂の最後の希望と呼べる存在かもしれません」
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Ich bin Reverend Hieronymus – Hieronymus Doloroso, so mein Name. Leiter der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}-Mission und möglicherweise die letzte Hoffnung für die verirrten Seelen in diesem Randgebiet, das von unserem Meister vergessen wurde."
languages.original_text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin Reverend Hieronymus – Hieronymus Doloroso, so mein Name. Leiter der {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusianer{/g}-Mission und möglicherweise die letzte Hoffnung für die verirrten Seelen in diesem Randgebiet, das von unserem Meister vergessen wurde."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: « Je suis le révérend Hiéronymus, Hiéronymus Doloroso, de mon nom complet. Responsable de la mission {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusienne{/g}, et potentiellement dernier espoir des âmes en perdition de cette zone reculée et abandonnée par notre Maître. »
languages.original_text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le révérend Hiéronymus, Hiéronymus Doloroso, de mon nom complet. Responsable de la mission {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}drusienne{/g}, et potentiellement dernier espoir des âmes en perdition de cette zone reculée et abandonnée par notre Maître. »
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian

languages.text: "Ben Muhterem Hieronymus. Hieronymus Doloroso da derler. {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusus{/g} misyonunun başı, Efendimizin terk ettiği bu sınır diyarındaki başıboş ruhların belki de son umuduyum."
languages.original_text: "I am Reverend Hieronymus — Hieronymus Doloroso, as I'm called. Head of the {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusian{/g} mission and possibly the last hope for the wayward souls that inhabit this fringe forsaken by our Master."

traits.locale_text: "Ben Muhterem Hieronymus. Hieronymus Doloroso da derler. {g|Encyclopedia:Drusians}Drusus{/g} misyonunun lideriyim ve Efendi'mizin terk ettiği bu sınır diyarındaki başıboş ruhlar için belki de son umudum."
traits.speaker: FootfallZandorDrusian
